page.title: 07THE URCHFONT BUTCHER
page.content: THE BUTCHER AT URCHFONT IS NOT A NATIVE OF THE AREA HE HAS BEEN HERE 11 YEARS. HIS PREMIES ARE 18TH CENTURY THATCHED AND NOT MODERNISED. HE HS A DOUBLE FRONTED HOUSE WITH A SHOP WINDOW. MOST OF THE PREMISES ARE USED FOR THE PREPERATION OF MEAT AND THE MAKING OF SAUSAGES FAGGOTS AND OTHER SPECIALITIES.HE IS WIDLEY RENOWNED FOR HIS SPECIAL BRAND OF PORK SAUSAGESHE RECIPE (WHICH ORIGINATED IN DEVON) IS HIS WELL KEPT SECRET, EACH WEEK HE PRODUCES APPROXIMATELY 500lbs. THE NEAREST OPPOSITION IS TWO MILES AWAY AT MARKET LAVINGTON. THE BUTHCHERS SHOP IS ALSO A GENERAL STORE AND SELLS GROCERIES, TINNED FOOD, EGGS, HOME MADE BREAD AND FRUIT AND VEGETABLES TRULY A VILLAGE AMENITY, ALL THE AREA ACTIVITIES ARE ADVERTISED IN HIS WINDOW.
